noAccessKey.description: Enforce that theaccessKeyattribute is not used on any HTML element.

noAriaHiddenOnFocusable.description: Enforce that aria-hidden=“true” is not set on focusable elements.

noAriaUnsupportedElements.description: Enforce that elements that do not support ARIA roles, states, and properties do not have those attributes.

noAutofocus.description: Enforce that autoFocus prop is not used on elements.

noDistractingElements.description: Enforces that no distracting elements are used.

noHeaderScope.description: The scope prop should be used only on<th>elements.

noInteractiveElementToNoninteractiveRole.description: Enforce that non-interactive ARIA roles are not assigned to interactive HTML elements.

noLabelWithoutControl.description: Enforce that a label element or component has a text label and an associated input.

noNoninteractiveElementInteractions.description: Disallow use event handlers on non-interactive elements.

noNoninteractiveElementToInteractiveRole.description: Enforce that interactive ARIA roles are not assigned to non-interactive HTML elements.

noNoninteractiveTabindex.description: Enforce thattabIndexis not assigned to non-interactive HTML elements.

noPositiveTabindex.description: Prevent the usage of positive integers ontabIndexproperty

noRedundantAlt.description: Enforceimgalt prop does not contain the word “image”, “picture”, or “photo”.

noRedundantRoles.description: Enforce explicitroleproperty is not the same as implicit/default role property on an element.

noStaticElementInteractions.description: Enforce that static, visible elements (such as<div>) that have click handlers use the valid role attribute.

noSvgWithoutTitle.description: Enforces the usage of thetitleelement for thesvgelement.

useAltText.description: Enforce that all elements that require alternative text have meaningful information to relay back to the end user.

useAnchorContent.description: Enforce that anchors have content and that the content is accessible to screen readers.

useAriaActivedescendantWithTabindex.description: Enforce thattabIndexis assigned to non-interactive HTML elements witharia-activedescendant.

useAriaPropsForRole.description: Enforce that elements with ARIA roles must have all required ARIA attributes for that role.

useAriaPropsSupportedByRole.description: Enforce that ARIA properties are valid for the roles that are supported by the element.

useButtonType.description: Enforces the usage of the attributetypefor the elementbutton

useFocusableInteractive.description: Elements with an interactive role and interaction handlers must be focusable.

useHeadingContent.description: Enforce that heading elements (h1, h2, etc.) have content and that the content is accessible to screen readers. Accessible means that it is not hidden using the aria-hidden prop.

useIframeTitle.description: Enforces the usage of the attributetitlefor the elementiframe.

useKeyWithClickEvents.description: Enforce onClick is accompanied by at least one of the following:onKeyUp,onKeyDown,onKeyPress.

useMediaCaption.description: Enforces thataudioandvideoelements must have atrackfor captions.

useSemanticElements.description: It detects the use ofroleattributes in JSX elements and suggests using semantic elements instead.

useValidAnchor.description: Enforce that all anchors are valid, and they are navigable elements.

useValidAriaProps.description: Ensures that ARIA propertiesaria-*are all valid.

useValidAriaRole.description: Elements with ARIA roles must use a valid, non-abstract ARIA role.

useValidAriaValues.description: Enforce that ARIA state and property values are valid.

useValidAutocomplete.description: Use valid values for theautocompleteattribute oninputelements.

useValidLang.description: Ensure that the attribute passed to thelangattribute is a correct ISO language and/or country.

noAdjacentSpacesInRegex.description: Disallow unclear usage of consecutive space characters in regular expression literals

noBannedTypes.description: Disallow primitive type aliases and misleading types.

noEmptyTypeParameters.description: Disallow empty type parameters in type aliases and interfaces.

noExcessiveCognitiveComplexity.description: Disallow functions that exceed a given Cognitive Complexity score.

noExcessiveLinesPerFunction.description: Restrict the number of lines of code in a function.

noExcessiveNestedTestSuites.description: This rule enforces a maximum depth to nesteddescribe()in test files.

noFlatMapIdentity.description: Disallow to use unnecessary callback onflatMap.

noStaticOnlyClass.description: This rule reports when a class has no non-static members, such as for a class used exclusively as a static namespace.

noUselessEmptyExport.description: Disallow empty exports that don’t change anything in a module file.

noUselessEscapeInRegex.description: Disallow unnecessary escape sequence in regular expression literals.

noUselessRename.description: Disallow renaming import, export, and destructured assignments to the same name.

noUselessStringConcat.description: Disallow unnecessary concatenation of string or template literals.

noUselessStringRaw.description: Disallow unnecessaryString.rawfunction in template string literals without any escape sequence.

noUselessTernary.description: Disallow ternary operators when simpler alternatives exist.

noVoid.description: Disallow the use ofvoidoperators, which is not a familiar operator.

useArrowFunction.description: Use arrow functions over function expressions.

useDateNow.description: UseDate.now()to get the number of milliseconds since the Unix Epoch.

useFlatMap.description: Promotes the use of.flatMap()whenmap().flat()are used together.

useIndexOf.description: PreferArray#{indexOf,lastIndexOf}()overArray#{findIndex,findLastIndex}()when looking for the index of an item.

useLiteralKeys.description: Enforce the usage of a literal access to properties over computed property access.

useNumericLiterals.description: DisallowparseInt()andNumber.parseInt()in favor of binary, octal, and hexadecimal literals

useOptionalChain.description: Enforce using concise optional chain instead of chained logical expressions.

useRegexLiterals.description: Enforce the use of the regular expression literals instead of the RegExp constructor if possible.

useSimpleNumberKeys.description: Disallow number literal object member names which are not base 10 or use underscore as separator.

useSimplifiedLogicExpression.description: Discard redundant terms from logical expressions.

useWhile.description: Enforce the use ofwhileloops instead offorloops when the initializer and update expressions are not needed.

noConstantMathMinMaxClamp.description: Disallow the use ofMath.minandMath.maxto clamp a value where the result itself is constant.

noConstructorReturn.description: Disallow returning a value from aconstructor.

noEmptyCharacterClassInRegex.description: Disallow empty character classes in regular expression literals.

noGlobalDirnameFilename.description: Disallow the use of__dirnameand__filenamein the global scope.

noGlobalObjectCalls.description: Disallow calling global object properties as functions

noInnerDeclarations.description: Disallowfunctionandvardeclarations that are accessible outside their block.

noInvalidBuiltinInstantiation.description: Ensure that builtins are correctly instantiated.

noInvalidConstructorSuper.description: Prevents the incorrect use ofsuper()inside classes. It also checks whether a callsuper()is missing from classes that extends other constructors.

noInvalidUseBeforeDeclaration.description: Disallow the use of variables, function parameters, classes, and enums before their declaration

noNestedComponentDefinitions.description: Disallows defining React components inside other components.

noNodejsModules.description: Forbid the use of Node.js builtin modules.

noPrecisionLoss.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

noReactPropAssignments.description: Disallow assigning to React component props.

noRenderReturnValue.description: Prevent the usage of the return value ofReact.render.

noRestrictedElements.description: Disallow the use of configured elements.

noSelfAssign.description: Disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same.

noSetterReturn.description: Disallow returning a value from a setter

noSolidDestructuredProps.description: Disallow destructuring props inside JSX components in Solid projects.

noStringCaseMismatch.description: Disallow comparison of expressions modifying the string case with non-compliant value.

noUndeclaredDependencies.description: Disallow the use of dependencies that aren’t specified in thepackage.json.

noUndeclaredVariables.description: Prevents the usage of variables that haven’t been declared inside the document.

noUnreachableSuper.description: Ensures thesuper()constructor is called exactly once on every code  path in a class constructor beforethisis accessed if the class has a superclass

noUnsafeFinally.description: Disallow control flow statements in finally blocks.

noUnsafeOptionalChaining.description: Disallow the use of optional chaining in contexts where the undefined value is not allowed.

noVoidElementsWithChildren.description: This rules prevents void elements (AKA self-closing elements) from having children.

noVoidTypeReturn.description: Disallow returning a value from a function with the return type ‘void’

useExhaustiveDependencies.description: Enforce correct dependency usage within React hooks.

useHookAtTopLevel.description: Enforce that all React hooks are being called from the Top Level component functions.

useImageSize.description: Enforces thatelements have both width and height attributes.

useImportExtensions.description: Enforce file extensions for relative imports.

useJsonImportAttributes.description: Enforces the use ofwith { type: "json" }for JSON module imports.

useJsxKeyInIterable.description: Disallow missing key props in iterators/collection literals.

useParseIntRadix.description: Enforce the consistent use of the radix argument when usingparseInt().

useQwikClasslist.description: Prefer using theclassprop as a classlist over theclassnameshelper.

useSingleJsDocAsterisk.description: Enforce JSDoc comment lines to start with a single asterisk, except for the first one.

useUniqueElementIds.description: Prevent the usage of static string literalidattribute on elements.

useValidForDirection.description: Enforce “for” loop update clause moving the counter in the right direction.

useValidTypeof.description: This rule checks that the result of atypeofexpression is compared to a valid value.

noBeforeInteractiveScriptOutsideDocument.description: Prevent usage ofnext/script’sbeforeInteractivestrategy outside ofpages/_document.jsin a Next.js project.

noDivRegex.description: Disallow equal signs explicitly at the beginning of regular expressions.

noDuplicatedSpreadProps.description: Disallow JSX prop spreading the same identifier multiple times.

noEqualsToNull.description: Require the use of===or!==for comparison withnull.

noExcessiveClassesPerFile.description: Enforce a maximum number of classes per file.

noExcessiveLinesPerFile.description: Restrict the number of lines in a file.

noFloatingClasses.description: Disallownewoperators outside of assignments or comparisons.

noFloatingPromises.description: Require Promise-like statements to be handled appropriately.

noForIn.description: Disallow iterating using a for-in loop.

noIncrementDecrement.description: Disallows the usage of the unary operators ++ and —.

noJsxLiterals.description: Disallow string literals inside JSX elements.

noJsxPropsBind.description: Disallow .bind(), arrow functions, or function expressions in JSX props

noLeakedRender.description: Prevent problematic leaked values from being rendered.

noMisusedPromises.description: Disallow Promises to be used in places where they are almost certainly a

noMultiAssign.description: Disallow use of chained assignment expressions

noMultiStr.description: Disallow creating multiline strings by escaping newlines.

noNextAsyncClientComponent.description: Prevent client components from being async functions.

noParametersOnlyUsedInRecursion.description: Disallow function parameters that are only used in recursive calls.

noProto.description: Disallow the use of the deprecated__proto__object property.

noReactForwardRef.description: Replaces usages offorwardRefwith passingrefas a prop.

noShadow.description: Disallow variable declarations from shadowing variables declared in the outer scope.

noSyncScripts.description: Prevent the usage of synchronous scripts.

noUndeclaredEnvVars.description: Disallow the use of undeclared environment variables.

noUnnecessaryConditions.description: Disallow unnecessary type-based conditions that can be statically determined as redundant.

noUnusedExpressions.description: Disallow expression statements that are neither a function call nor an

noVueDataObjectDeclaration.description: Enforce that Vue componentdataoptions are declared as functions.

noVueDuplicateKeys.description: Disallow duplicate keys in Vue component data, methods, computed properties, and other options.

noVueOptionsApi.description: Disallow the use of Vue Options API.

noVueReservedKeys.description: Disallow reserved keys in Vue component data and computed properties.

noVueReservedProps.description: Disallow reserved names to be used as props.

noVueSetupPropsReactivityLoss.description: Disallow destructuring ofpropspassed tosetupin Vue projects.

useArraySortCompare.description: Require Array#sort and Array#toSorted calls to always provide a compareFunction.

useConsistentEnumValueType.description: Disallow enums from having both number and string members.

useDestructuring.description: Require destructuring from arrays and/or objects

useErrorCause.description: Enforce thatnew Error()is thrown with the original error ascause.

useExhaustiveSwitchCases.description: Require switch-case statements to be exhaustive.

useExplicitType.description: Enforce types in functions, methods, variables, and parameters.

useFind.description: Enforce the use of Array.prototype.find() over Array.prototype.filter() followed by [0] when looking for a single result.

useInlineScriptId.description: Enforceidattribute onnext/scriptcomponents with inline content ordangerouslySetInnerHTML.

useMaxParams.description: Enforce a maximum number of parameters in function definitions.

useQwikMethodUsage.description: Disallowuse*hooks outside ofcomponent$or otheruse*hooks in Qwik applications.

useQwikValidLexicalScope.description: Disallow unserializable expressions in Qwik dollar ($) scopes.

useRegexpExec.description: EnforceRegExp#execoverString#matchif no global flag is provided.

useSortedClasses.description: Enforce the sorting of CSS utility classes.

useSpread.description: Enforce the use of the spread operator over.apply().

useVueDefineMacrosOrder.description: Enforce specific order of Vue compiler macros.

useVueMultiWordComponentNames.description: Enforce multi-word component names in Vue components.

noAccumulatingSpread.description: Disallow the use of spread (...) syntax on accumulators.

noBarrelFile.description: Disallow the use of barrel file.

noImgElement.description: Prevent usage ofelement in a Next.js project.

noNamespaceImport.description: Disallow the use of namespace imports.

useGoogleFontPreconnect.description: Ensure thepreconnectattribute is used when using Google Fonts.

useSolidForComponent.description: Enforce using Solid’s<For />component for mapping an array to JSX elements.

useTopLevelRegex.description: Require regex literals to be declared at the top level.

noDangerouslySetInnerHtml.description: Prevent the usage of dangerous JSX props

noDangerouslySetInnerHtmlWithChildren.description: Report when a DOM element or a component uses bothchildrenanddangerouslySetInnerHTMLprop.

noSecrets.description: Disallow usage of sensitive data such as API keys and tokens.

noCommonJs.description: Disallow use of CommonJs module system in favor of ESM style imports.

noDoneCallback.description: Disallow using a callback in asynchronous tests and hooks.

noHeadElement.description: Prevent usage of<head>element in a Next.js project.

noImplicitBoolean.description: Disallow implicittruevalues on JSX boolean attributes

noInferrableTypes.description: Disallow type annotations for variables, parameters, and class properties initialized with a literal expression.

noMagicNumbers.description: Reports usage of “magic numbers” — numbers used directly instead of being assigned to named constants.

noNegationElse.description: Disallow negation in the condition of anifstatement if it has anelseclause.

noNonNullAssertion.description: Disallow non-null assertions using the!postfix operator.

noParameterProperties.description: Disallow the use of parameter properties in class constructors.

noRestrictedGlobals.description: This rule allows you to specify global variable names that you don’t want to use in your application.

noRestrictedImports.description: Disallow specified modules when loaded by import or require.

noShoutyConstants.description: Disallow the use of constants which its value is the upper-case version of its name.

noUnusedTemplateLiteral.description: Disallow template literals if interpolation and special-character handling are not needed

noYodaExpression.description: Disallow the use of yoda expressions.

useAsConstAssertion.description: Enforce the use ofas constover literal type and type annotation.

useComponentExportOnlyModules.description: Enforce declaring components only within modules that export React Components exclusively.

useConsistentBuiltinInstantiation.description: Enforce the use ofnewfor all builtins, exceptString,NumberandBoolean.

useConsistentCurlyBraces.description: This rule enforces consistent use of curly braces inside JSX attributes and JSX children.

useConsistentMemberAccessibility.description: Require consistent accessibility modifiers on class properties and methods.

useConsistentObjectDefinitions.description: Require the consistent declaration of object literals. Defaults to explicit definitions.

useConsistentTypeDefinitions.description: Enforce type definitions to consistently use eitherinterfaceortype.

useConst.description: Requireconstdeclarations for variables that are only assigned once.

useDefaultParameterLast.description: Enforce default function parameters and optional function parameters to be last.

useDefaultSwitchClause.description: Require the default clause in switch statements.

useEnumInitializers.description: Require that each enum member value be explicitly initialized.

useExplicitLengthCheck.description: Enforce explicitly comparing thelength,size,byteLengthorbyteOffsetproperty of a value.

useExponentiationOperator.description: Disallow the use ofMath.powin favor of the**operator.

useExportType.description: Promotes the use ofexport typefor types.

useExportsLast.description: Require that all exports are declared after all non-export statements.

useFilenamingConvention.description: Enforce naming conventions for JavaScript and TypeScript filenames.

useForOf.description: Prefer usingfor...ofloops over standardforloops where possible.

useFragmentSyntax.description: This rule enforces the use of<>...</>over<Fragment>...</Fragment>.

useGroupedAccessorPairs.description: Enforce that getters and setters for the same property are adjacent in class and object definitions.

useImportType.description: Promotes the use ofimport typefor types.

useLiteralEnumMembers.description: Require all enum members to be literal values.

useNamingConvention.description: Enforce naming conventions for everything across a codebase.

useNodejsImportProtocol.description: Enforces using thenode:protocol for Node.js builtin modules.

useNumberNamespace.description: Use theNumberproperties instead of global ones.

useNumericSeparators.description: Enforce the use of numeric separators in numeric literals.

useObjectSpread.description: Prefer object spread overObject.assign()when constructing new objects.

useReactFunctionComponents.description: Enforce that components are defined as functions and never as classes.

useReadonlyClassProperties.description: Enforce marking members asreadonlyif they are never modified outside the constructor.

useSelfClosingElements.description: Prevent extra closing tags for components without children.

useShorthandAssign.description: Require assignment operator shorthand where possible.

useShorthandFunctionType.description: Enforce using function types instead of object type with call signatures.

useSingleVarDeclarator.description: Disallow multiple variable declarations in the same variable statement

useSymbolDescription.description: Require a description parameter for theSymbol().

useTemplate.description: Prefer template literals over string concatenation.

useUnifiedTypeSignatures.description: Disallow overload signatures that can be unified into a single signature.

noApproximativeNumericConstant.description: Use standard constants instead of approximated literals.

noArrayIndexKey.description: Discourage the usage of Array index in keys.

noAsyncPromiseExecutor.description: Disallows using an async function as a Promise executor.

noCatchAssign.description: Disallow reassigning exceptions in catch clauses.

noCommentText.description: Prevent comments from being inserted as text nodes

noConfusingLabels.description: Disallow labeled statements that are not loops.

noConfusingVoidType.description: Disallowvoidtype outside of generic or return types.

noConstantBinaryExpressions.description: Disallow expressions where the operation doesn’t affect the value

noControlCharactersInRegex.description: Prevents from having control characters and some escape sequences that match control characters in regular expression literals.

noDuplicateElseIf.description: Disallow duplicate conditions in if-else-if chains

noDuplicateJsxProps.description: Prevents JSX properties to be assigned multiple times.

noDuplicateObjectKeys.description: Disallow two keys with the same name inside objects.

noDuplicateTestHooks.description: Adescribeblock should not contain duplicate hooks.

noEmptyBlockStatements.description: Disallow empty block statements and static blocks.

noEmptyInterface.description: Disallow the declaration of empty interfaces.

noEvolvingTypes.description: Disallow variables from evolving intoanytype through reassignments.

noExtraNonNullAssertion.description: Prevents the wrong usage of the non-null assertion operator (!) in TypeScript files.

noGlobalAssign.description: Disallow assignments to native objects and read-only global variables.

noHeadImportInDocument.description: Prevent using thenext/headmodule inpages/_document.json Next.js projects.

noImplicitAnyLet.description: Disallow use of implicitanytype on variable declarations.

noIrregularWhitespace.description: Disallows the use of irregular whitespace characters.

noLabelVar.description: Disallow labels that share a name with a variable

noMisleadingCharacterClass.description: Disallow characters made with multiple code points in character class syntax.

noMisplacedAssertion.description: Checks that the assertion function, for exampleexpect, is placed inside anit()function call.

noMisrefactoredShorthandAssign.description: Disallow shorthand assign when variable appears on both sides.

noNonNullAssertedOptionalChain.description: Disallow non-null assertions after optional chaining expressions.

noOctalEscape.description: Disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

noReactSpecificProps.description: Prevents React-specific JSX properties from being used.

noRedeclare.description: Disallow variable, function, class, and type redeclarations in the same scope.

noSelfCompare.description: Disallow comparisons where both sides are exactly the same.

noShadowRestrictedNames.description: Disallow identifiers from shadowing restricted names.

noSparseArray.description: Prevents the use of sparse arrays (arrays with holes).

noSuspiciousSemicolonInJsx.description: It detects possible “wrong” semicolons inside JSX elements.

noTemplateCurlyInString.description: Disallow template literal placeholder syntax in regular strings.

noTsIgnore.description: Prevents the use of the TypeScript directive@ts-ignore.

noUnassignedVariables.description: Disallowletorvarvariables that are read but never assigned.

noUnsafeDeclarationMerging.description: Disallow unsafe declaration merging between interfaces and classes.

noUselessEscapeInString.description: Disallow unnecessary escapes in string literals.

noUselessRegexBackrefs.description: Disallow useless backreferences in regular expression literals that always match an empty string.

useAdjacentOverloadSignatures.description: Disallow the use of overload signatures that are not next to each other.

useDefaultSwitchClauseLast.description: Enforce default clauses in switch statements to be last

useErrorMessage.description: Enforce passing a message value when creating a built-in error.

useGetterReturn.description: Enforcegetmethods to always return a value.

useGoogleFontDisplay.description: Enforces the use of a recommendeddisplaystrategy with Google Fonts.

useIterableCallbackReturn.description: Enforce consistent return values in iterable callbacks.

useNamespaceKeyword.description: Require using thenamespacekeyword over themodulekeyword to declare TypeScript namespaces.

useNumberToFixedDigitsArgument.description: Enforce using the digits argument withNumber#toFixed().

useStaticResponseMethods.description: Use staticResponsemethods instead ofnew Response()constructor when possible.

useStrictMode.description: Enforce the use of the directive"use strict"in script files.
